thread.title: Kate Mara, Jamie Bell spotted on romantic stroll in NYC
thread.title_full: Kate Mara, Jamie Bell spotted on romantic stroll in NYC - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Kate Mara, Jamie Bell spotted on romantic stroll in NYC
text:
Christopher Peterson/Splash News Kate Mara and Jamie Bell kiss on a Soho street corner Thursday in New York City. Kate Mara and Jamie Bell make one fantastic couple.
The “Fantastic Four” co-stars were spotted taking a romantic stroll in New York City on Thursday, confirming their status as a couple.
Mara, 32, and Bell, 29, weren’t shy in showing their affection for one another, including sharing a kiss on a Soho street corner.
The actors have been dating since earlier this fall, according to People , although neither have publicly commented on their relationship.
Alo Ceballos/GC Images Kate Mara and Jamie Bell co-starred in the box office flop “Fantastic Four.” Mara and Bell were first rumored to be an item while promoting their superhero flick earlier this summer.
“Fantastic Four” bombed at the box office, but the stars' relationship seems to have only heated up since the film was released in August.
Prior to dating her co-star, Mara's last relationship was with actor Max Minghella. The couple split in 2014 after four years of dating.
As for Bell, his new romance comes a year after separating from his actress wife Evan Rachel Wood , with whom he has a 2-year-old son.
Related Stories Kate Mara and other actors who hate their own films Tags: kate mara , jamie bell
